questions: Is there a ballerina in the image?
Is there an iceberg in the image?
Is there a ship in the image?
Is the ballerina pirouetting on the iceberg?
Is the ship behind the iceberg?
model_output:
yes There is a figure resembling a ballerina in the image.
no There is no visible iceberg; the figure appears to be on a pedestal.
yes There is a tilted boat resembling a ship in the background.
no The ballerina is not on an iceberg; she is on a pedestal.
yes The ship is visually located behind what might be mistaken for an iceberg but is actually part of the surreal setting.
